items.question: What video formats are compatible for rotoscoping?
items.answer: We support all major video formats including MP4, AVI, and MOV. Ensure your videos are clear and with good lighting for optimal results.

items.question: How accurate is the AI in masking objects?
items.answer: Our AI offers precision masking capabilities, often achieving frame-perfect isolation. Adjustments can be made manually for perfect results.

items.question: Can I use the animations commercially?
items.answer: Yes! All animations created through WaveSpeed Studio come with full commercial rights. Use them for marketing, films, and more.

items.question: What if I've never done rotoscoping before?
items.answer: No problem! Our user-friendly interface makes it easy for beginners, with tutorials and guidelines available to help you along.

items.question: How long until my animated clips are ready?
items.answer: Typically, processing takes only minutes, depending on the length and complexity of the video.

items.question: Is there customer support available?
items.answer: Absolutely! We provide detailed documentation, video tutorials, and customer support via chat and email to assist you.

items.question: Can I edit my clips after rotoscoping?
items.answer: Yes, after exporting your animations, you can further edit them in any major video editing software.

items.question: What pricing options are available for rotoscoping?
items.answer: We offer a flexible pay-as-you-go pricing model, charging only for the videos you generate, no hidden fees.

items.question: Are there any limitations on the number of videos I can create?
items.answer: There are no limits! You can create as many rotoscoped videos as you need at any time.

items.question: What industries can benefit from AI rotoscoping?
items.answer: AI rotoscoping is useful in film, advertising, education, gaming, and social media, revolutionizing how visuals are created.
